column5: Warm, Cozy house located in North of Fort Worth with family-friendly and safe environment close to shopping and restaurants. Conveniently located in Alliance/North Fort Worth, 5 minutes drive to I35, Alliance Town Center and 15 minutes drive to Fort Worth downtown.   Looking for long term single student/professional renters and no pets/smoking allowed.
column8: Warm, Cozy Private Room in North Fort Worth
